questiontext.text:
In a farm there are:

  • 3 chicken
  • 4 ducks
  • 5 cows
  • 2 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%42}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%12}
  3. {1:MRH:%-34%chicken~%-34%ducks~%100%cows~%-34%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 1 chicken
  • 5 ducks
  • 2 cows
  • 2 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%28}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%6}
  3. {1:MRH:%-34%chicken~%100%ducks~%-34%cows~%-34%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 3 chicken
  • 2 ducks
  • 1 cows
  • 4 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%30}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%6}
  3. {1:MRH:%-34%chicken~%-34%ducks~%-34%cows~%100%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 1 chicken
  • 1 ducks
  • 2 cows
  • 1 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%16}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%5}
  3. {1:MRH:%-50%chicken~%-50%ducks~%50%cows~%50%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total
